vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
πήγᾰνον, τό,
rue, Ruta graveolens, [Refs 4th c.BC+]; π. ὀρεινόν, ἄγριον, mountain rue, Ruta halepensis, [Refs 1st c.AD+], i.e. scarcely at the edge or beginning of a thing, because these herbs were planted for borders in gardens, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; compare περίκηπος.
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
rue (a garden herb)
rue, a plant, ruta graveolens of Linnaeus, Lk. 11:42*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 芸香
2) 大約 2 呎(60 公分)高的灌木植物, 具藥用價值 (路11:42)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 芸香
2) 大约 2 呎(60 公分)高的灌木植物, 具药用价值 (路11:42)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: vân hương (tên khoa học: Ruta graveolens) là một loài thực vật có hoa trong họ Rutaceae. Xem G4078
